Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Lovely cafe! It's my place to go in AMS

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Great cosy caf√© where you can also have lunch and dinner. Very attentive staff. Great canal terrace. Only problem: they use a industrial Nespresso machine instead of a proper espresso machine. So avoid Coffee here, neither espresso not latte machiato are really drinkable.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Hip and  cozy place both indoors and canal pop op terrace üòä. ‚ÄúIndoors Interior with Original authentic Dutch gives a good vibe‚Äù.  These were words from my 12 yes old girl. DELICIOUS food with variety choices. We can have food here all day - breakfast, lunch, dinner and parents sneaking out for drinksü§´.  Totally, recommend this place.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Good place to eat! The staff is quite friendly. When you see the menu, there is not a big difference between the starters and the main dishes. The starters turned out to be big and the main dishes not too big. Actually it is a good ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Wonderful location in the city of Amsterdam. The "Lokaal van de Stad" is located in very central position and it is so amazing to see people and cars walking and driving by: Here you are IN THE CITY AND GET THE PULSE! Local Guide & Influencer Marcus Wenzel | MarcusWenzelTV

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Great selection of beers and ditto food to go with it (the tatsuta is delicious and I‚Äôm so glad the ginger beef is back on the regular menu). The outdoor seating has been expanded this year because of COVID and hopefully they get to keep it because it‚Äôs the perfect place for late afternoon drinks with view over the canal.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Came with my new puppy, and the staff was super friendly and helpful. Service was great  they welcomed my buddy and brought him water, the outside tables are lovely. Will definitely go back often for a nice beer :)

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: The service here is the slowest I ever experienced. We got  our beers after 20mins... the waitress said that it will take some time because it's busy and after that she was just talking to her co-worker instead of serving us. ....Never going here again

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Terribly bad service, so slow that it hurts. Minimum 20min to get your order (beers/drinks and not food...). The waiters just stand around without serving and then blame the busy hours. And this with 5 waiters...

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Love the vibe , terrace on a water , nice selection of drinks and foods

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: This place got it together for the pandemic lockdown and made it safe and easy. Great casual place - great varieties of beer and cocktails. The sweet potato fries are awesome as well as other bites. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Very good service and a variety of drinks! They took my reservation very seriously also :)

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Superb location, good beers and good (vegan) food.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Very nice terrace with superb riverview. Large choice of beers and wines. The nachos (7‚Ç¨50) were incredible, the best we ever had, even decided to order second round!

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Typical cozy Dutch pub, yet still with decent space inside. The outside sitting is amazing, right by the canal. Try their sweet potatoe fries, they are amazing!!

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Great selection of food and drinks with beautiful view at the canal.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: An absolute gem in the bar / cafe scene of the neighborhood. Best sweet potato fries I've ever had, combined with a nicely crispy chicken burget and an impressive beer menu. Great for lunch & drinks.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text:
Nice new spot in the neighborhood, definitely needed. Good selection of beers and food, from tapas-like starters to mains.
The Suriname Bitterballen were really tasty, a cool take on the original taste. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Very friendly staff! Nice food and drinks, will be back.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad

Review Text: Fantastic snacks, nice atmosphere, large beer selection

Review Text: super friendly staff, nice variety of beers. will definitely go back to try some food

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: This is a nice place to share an evening. Ample seating outside and inside (two floors). The wait staff is friendly. The food was rather expensive but tasty. They also have smoothies! Which I didn't try but will the next time. I went on a ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Great place, especially recommending special set called "granat" that is certainly a good start of every memorable evening.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Very nice atmosphere and the food was quite tasty. The service is very friendly but at times didn‚Äôt process the order, which caused us having to order again.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: My boyfriend and  I stayed in Amsterdam for 4 nights and we came to this bar every single night after our busy days touring around. We found this to be the perfect spot to unwind and grab some food and drinks at the end of a long day. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad

Name: Lokaal van de Stad

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Great craft beers, tasty food, fantastic staff. What more could you ask for?

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text:
Quite good place for a sunny day !
Staff is quite friendly and the waiting time is good even when it's quite packed. Have a short selection of beers but for me is enough . ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Excellent food, beer, and service. I recommend the wonton-duck soup VERY delicious.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Great place, but the only place in Amsterdam that, in the last 13 years that makes me walk out second time without ordering after 45 plus minutes waiting and only 4 tables occupied outside, 3 girls serving. They look inexperienced, get a good manager or team leader.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: When this place first opened we had such high hopes, the food was tasty and the service was really quick and friendly. But sadly the past two visits have not been great. Both times we had SUPER slow service, we've just now left after ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Have been going here since it opened and liking it so far. The one issue is that the inside sometimes smells like sewage which can be a massive turnoff.. luckily they have great outdoor seating. A large selection of beers but no cocktails ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Nice little place with super-friendly staff, chatty customers, a nice view of the local canal, and occasionally a band! ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Great place, great selection of beers. The snacks are very unique and tasty. It would be excellent if they had a separate area for smokers given that the tables outside are close to each other, but I guess that's part of Amsterdam in general.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Great local place for beer and coffee!!

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Great view of the canal, good food and a great variety of bier. Would definitely visit again!

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text:
Love wonton soup with duck. Last time I was there they took this menu out. :(
So far, the food was delicious, great price and good quality.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: One of our neighbourhood favourites. They have a very good beer selection and in a very good location. We love the food and the staff is super friendly. It just a little pricy. But somehow worth it. Has outside seating and it's a delight when the weather is beautiful. I will come back for sure.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: What can i say ,beautifully lit

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Lovely little place. Visited a couple of times during a recent visit. Food is pleasant. Staff are exceptionally nice, but it was consistently quite hard to get their attention. More often than not we ended up ordering inside. Either way, lovely place to spend an evening.

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: We ate a pulled pork burguer and the duck and they were all very tasty. In the lunch menu there's a variety of sandwiches and 3 options of burguers but I was expecting to find other dutch warm dishes but they were only available at dinner ‚Ä¶

Name: Lokaal van de Stad

Name: Lokaal van de Stad

Name: Lokaal van de Stad

Name: Lokaal van de Stad
Review Text: Perhaps a bit brusque when busy but mind your manners and say alstjeblift and dank u wel and all will be good. It is, however, a real Dutch Street cafe bar in the summer. You wanted to experience the real NL right? Then chill and eat and drink and be cool... Proost!
